players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "I trust Diana's investigation. Let's vote Bob out."
Charlie: "Let's vote Bob out now. Diana's investigation is our only lead and Bob has no defense."
You: "Diana is lying to protect herself. I'm not the mafioso—vote her out instead!"
Diana: "Bob is clearly lying to save himself. I am the detective and my investigation proves he is mafia. Charlie, we must vote together to win."
